group_1.textCenter: (Well... let's cut ties with these lingering@feelings...)
(Maybe these feelings came out because I'm@still friends with him.)
(If that's the case, then as I thought, I've been@indifferent to them on purpose.)
(If we hadn't gone back to being friends, I wonder@if these feelings would have come out in the first@place...)

group_1.textRight: Hey, did you watch that movie?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I did! The last battle was ON FIRE!

group_1.textCenter: (Seems like I'm in the perfect spot to listen to@their conversation.)
(I'll just pretend to be playing with my phone@while I spy on them...)

group_1.textRight: Right! It was so cool!
But if you're gonna judge that ending as JUST@gruesome, it's better to just skip it.

group_1.textCenter: (He's laughing as always today. I wonder if he's@alright now...)

group_1.textRight: It will probably be known only from that last@battle, though.
As an individual, I believe the first half treats@the muddy aspect of human relationships...
Huh? Hey, what's up? Are you listening?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yeah I am!

group_1.textCenter: He's just putting on a bravado...

group_1.textLeft: Hey Togame, did you watch it? That movie!

group_1.textRight: Huh!? Me?

group_1.textLeft: Well, you're very clearly pretending to play with@your phone while listening to us...
I was wondering if you wanted to add anything@to the conversation...

group_1.textRight: I see...
(To get him to dislike me... I must be cold@to him...)
Well, I AM a bit curious about it.
But I think I'll wait to watch it for free with a@subscription.

group_1.textLeft: Haha, but we have no idea when that's gonna@happen.
But I get how you feel.
Since it also would be nice if it spreads around.

group_1.textRight: ... When you say it like that, you make me@wanna watch it at the cinema.

group_1.textLeft: Eh!? I... I see...
As I thought, the impact of watching it in the cinema@is much more appealing than watching it at home!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, the impact is crucial!

group_1.textLeft: That's true. The impact IS crucial.
EH!? No reaction...?
[chara:800400:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]...

group_1.narration: To get him to dislike me,@I tried to be cold to him but...@Why am I feeling so guilty?...
Well, I guess he IS in the middle@of a fight with his girlfriend.
If someone were to be cold@to him while that's going on...@Of course, it would hurt...

group_1.textRight: Um... Today's performance feels a bit gloomier@than usual...
Yeah, rather than merciful, it was more@compassionate...
That cross had different shackles... that's the@feeling I get.
Is it the same issue from yesterday? Are you@really okay...?

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah! It IS about that, but I'm totally fine!
(I did what I could to act like always, but I@ended up gaining their sympathy...)
(Furthermore, it came out on stage! Am I an@idiot?)

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry about yesterday!

group_1.textLeft: Eh!?

group_1.textRight: I was super rude towards you yesterday!
Truth is, I had a fight with my parents yesterday@and was really grumpy!
I'm really sorry!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, so that's what was going on! You hadn't@mentioned it at all!
But I'm so glad that's the case.
I was worried I had done something wrong for@you to hate me.

group_1.textRight: (He's super pleased...)
(Does that mean he's happy from the fact that@I don't hate him?)

group_1.textLeft: So were you able to make up with your parents?

group_1.textRight: (He's so kind!)

group_1.narration: This is bad...@I'm totally being affected by this whole thing...
Both the girl's worries whom we saved the other day@and that friend's love philosophy are affecting me.@And those little by little, show up on my face more and more!
I need to break through from this difficult situation!

group_1.textCenter: The more I try to forget, the more my true@feelings show on my face...
